subject: Re: FW: Screen Appointment Registration email - acc details need to be updated
preview: Hurray! Thanks Vicki for your help and thanks Rica for making those updates!  Kind regards,  Remona Mekdessi Sarkis Speech Pathologist (MSLP CPSP) Hills District Speech Therapy

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hurray! Thanks Vicki for your help and thanks Rica for making those updates!

Kind regards,

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis
Speech Pathologist (MSLP CPSP)
Hills District Speech Therapy

Hi all,

I have just submitted a new screener intake questionnaire and ALL IS CORRECT!!!!!

Kind regards,

Vicki Hargraves

Administration/Client Liaison - Hills District Speech Therapy 

Website: www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Email: vicki@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Phone: (02) 9054 1996

Contact Days & Times: Monday to Thursday 8am - 2pm

Friday 8am - 2pm

Social Media: @hdspeechtherapy

CANCELLATION POLICY: All appointments at HDST are made in advance and therefore reserved to meet your specific requirements and preferences. Cancellation fees do apply. Please see our cancellation policy for more information:https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/faqs/cancellation-policy/

We acknowledge the Traditional Owners of the land on which we provide our services, and pay respect to the spiritual, physical and cultural connection they have with their country and to their Elders past, present and emerging.

❗Please keep updated with our COVID-19 Safety Response by visiting: https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/covid-19/

This message is intended solely for the addressee. If you are not the intended recipient, any disclosure, copying or distribution of the message by you is prohibited and may be unlawful. Any confidentiality or privilege is not waived or lost because this email has been sent to you by mistake. Please immediately contact the sender if you have received it in error.

Hi Remona/Vicki, 

We have checked the confirmation message and missed that part, my apologies. We have corrected the fee now. 

Let us know if you need further assistance.
@rica please check it again... thanks

@manuel please read below:



Hi Remona, 

I have just filled in the screener intake questionnaire again and 2 out of 3 are now correct.  See below:

The information on the actual screener intake questionnaire is correct

The information when you get thanked for filling in the questionnaire on the website is incorrect:

Thank you for completing the questionnaire.

What happens next? 

A written summary report will be provided to you via mail approximately 3-4 weeks after the screenings. Copies will also be provided to the preschool staff (given your permission). The report will contain information about your child’s strengths and weaknesses in the areas of speech, language, social communication, fluency and voice. Recommendations about the need for further assessment or intervention will also be made. Appropriate strategies to help support your child may also be suggested.

Please feel free to contact us on 9054 1996 or bookings@hdspeechtherapy.com.au  if you have any questions.

This screener appointment will only be confirmed once a payment has been received.

If you are paying via Direct Deposit Transfer to HDST, please transfer $40 to the below account in order to secure your booking.
Hills District Speech Therapy
BSB: 082 155
Account Number: 12037 8403
Reference: Your child's full name

 The information you get when you receive the “what happens next email” is correct:

Thanks Vicki for investigating this so for me. I have CC'd in Rica from WPPerk - rica could you please see the email below and advise the updates can be made as soon as possible.

Kind regards,

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis
Speech Pathologist (MSLP CPSP)
Hills District Speech Therapy

Hi Remona, 

Sorry about that. We have made sure that everything is updated now. Please clear the cache on your browser to make sure that you will see the latest version of the form.

Let us know if you need further assistance.

@rica please check it again I update the acct.

Account Name: Hills District Speech Therapy
BSB: 083 004
Account Number: 29 371 5252

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica

Please see below - the are still edits required. Could you advise when it can be resolved? Thank you!

Kind regards,

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis
Speech Pathologist (MSLP CPSP)
Hills District Speech Therapy

Hi Remona, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.
@rica @rica all good now. task logged 3mins.

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli
Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Active and assigned to Glen Tenorio

Hi Team


Could you confirm if the preschool intake questionnaire form on our website has an automated confirmation email that it sends to clients? If so, we require the account details to be updated to:


Account Name: Hills District Speech Therapy

BSB: 083 004
Account Number: 29 371 5252


See below of the email that is typically received:

From: Hills District Speech Therapy <bookings@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>
Reply to: Bookings <bookings@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>
Date: Wednesday, 20 April 2022 at 8:54 am
To: Vicki Hargraves <vicki@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>
Subject: Screen Appointment Registration Received


Hi vvvvvvv,

Confirming we have received your registration for ssssss hhhhhh. Thank you!

What happens next?

A written summary report will be provided to you via email approximately 3-4 weeks after the screenings. Copies will also be provided to the preschool staff (given your permission). The report will contain information about your child's strengths and weaknesses in the areas of speech, language, social communication, fluency and voice. Recommendations about the need for further assessment or intervention will also be made. Appropriate strategies to help support your child may also be suggested.

Please feel free to contact us on 9054 1996 or bookings@hdspeechtherapy.com.au if you have any questions.

This screener appointment will only be confirmed once a payment has been received.

If you are paying via Direct Deposit Transfer to HDST, please transfer $50 to the below account in order to secure your booking, details below:


Hills District Speech Therapy
BSB: 082 155
Account Number: 12037 8403
Reference: Your child's full name/invoice


Regards,

The Team at Hills District Speech Therapy




Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist, Team Leader & Business Development Assistant (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy
